MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH1 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Jeffrey Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.07am. Our engineers have arrived at the Jeffrey Street substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.24am on Thursday 28th January 2021.
